title: Digital Marketer (Experienced) Job at Syntax Technology
content:
Syntax Technology is a Nigerian-based digital solutions company committed to delivering creative, strategic, and tailored digital services. With a team of skilled professionals, we partner with businesses—big or small—to turn their ideas into results.

Whether you're a start-up looking to build your online presence or an established company ready to scale, we offer the digital edge you need.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer (Experienced)

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Are you passionate and result driven Digital Marketer? We are looking for creative and experience individual to join our team.


Responsibilities


	Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns.
	Graphics design and content creation.
	Manage social media account management and increase engagement.
	Implement search engine optimization.
	Website creation and management.
	Digital marketing training and education.
	Edit and produce high quality video content for social media, websites and other digital platforms.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in digital marketing, with a focus on social media, email, and search engine.
	Strong written and verbal communication skills.
	Ability to think creatively and develop innovative digital marketing strategies.
	Proficiency in graphics design tools such as Corel draw.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: crecruitment50@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Head, Investment Job at Coronation
content:
Coronation is a leading financial service partner that helps build enduring legacies for sustainable wealth creation in Africa. Having established a 30-year record of achievements in banking across Africa and beyond, our founders established a Pan-African platform focused on building a better financial future for Africa. Today, our businesses are entrusted with our over $1billion of clients’ assets and are recognized as Nigeria's fastest-growing investment managers. Our purpose at Coronation is to create a prosperous future for our clients and the African continent. Coronation is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We enable an inclusive workplace by identity, disability, and other statuses protected by law.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Coronation Insurance Plc - an affiliated company to Coronation Group Ltd - is a leading insurance provider of a diverse range of products and services covering general and special risk businesses to individuals and corporate entities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head, Investment

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Responsibilities
Business Advisory and Stakeholder Management:


	Provide advisory services to the Board, Executive Management, and other stakeholders on best-fit strategies, operational plan, working capital requirements, and liquidity management, by leveraging on own deep expertise in strategy, and knowledge of key environmental trends, internal dynamics/resources and operating environment.
	Build valued relationships with stakeholders at the strategic level, and assemble coalitions, to support long term business development.


Foreign Currency and Market Risk Management:


	Develop strategy, policies, and tools to support the ongoing management of foreign exchange risk, liquidity and interest rate risks with the aim of mitigating the effects of volatility and unpredicted movement in market valuations (e.g. foreign currencies, interest rate).
	Manage the company’s foreign currency activities through the identification of FCY surpluses and deficits, and maintain oversight over active management of FCY windows, administration of FCY inflows into the company, and handling of overseas remittances either on behalf of the company. Working Capital Management.
	Define and manage the company’s strategy and processes for projecting, monitoring, analyzing, and optimizing its cash-flow, assets and liabilities through ratio analysis of operating expenses (e.g. working capital ratio, collection ratio), with the aim of ensuring the company is capable of continuing operations, and satisfying short-term debt, and upcoming operational expenses.
	Proactively engage various functions across the Company in respect to their capital/operating expenditure to determine periodic forecasts on working capital, provide cashflow forecast /position to Executive Management, and propose solutions where required.


Working Capital Management


	Define and manage the company’s strategy and processes for projecting, monitoring, analyzing, and optimizing its cash-flow, assets and liabilities through ratio analysis of operating expenses (e.g. working capital ratio, collection ratio), with the aim of ensuring the company is capable of continuing operations, and satisfying short-term debt, and upcoming operational expenses.
	Proactively engage various functions across the Company in respect to their capital/operating expenditure to determine periodic forecasts on working capital, provide cashflow forecast /position to Executive Management, and propose solutions where required.
	Transactional Treasury Processes:Implement company’s policy on capital structure by ensuring an appropriate distribution between debt and equity to minimize cost of funds (CoF) and maintain CoF within the Company’s prescribed band. Manage Relationships with Financial Institutions.
	Manage the organization’s relationships with other financial institutions (i.e. banks, fund custodians, trustees etc.), by negotiating favorable investment terms on behalf of the organization, escalating potential settlement failures to the Treasurers of other financial institutions to avoid unwanted outcomes, and managing the organization’s relationship with its designated banks.


What we are looking for
Educational Qualification and Work Experience:


	A minimum of a Bachelor’s Degree from an accredited university.
	8 - 10 years of relevant experience within a financial services company.
	Advanced business degree (preferably an MBA) is an added advantage.
	Relevant experience in insurance will be a huge advantage.
	Professional certification in finance and/or accounting from a recognized professional body (e.g. CFA, CGMA,ACCA, ICAN etc.)


Technical & Behavioural Competencies
Knowledge:


	Macroeconomic Analysis
	Market and Regulatory Environments.


Skills:


	Strategy
	Treasury Management
	Business Acumen Behavior
	Analytical Thinking
	Entrepreneurship
	Relationship Building for Influencing
	Leading and Developing Others
	Drive for Results.


Our Benefits


	To help you stay energized, engaged, and inspired, we offer a wide range of employee benefits including a competitive compensation package, a robust rewards package, retirement benefits and tools designed to help you build a sound financial future.
	We also provide an environment that fosters the actualization of goals, and career fulfillment for our people while providing transformational solutions for Africa’s challenges.


Flexible Working Arrangement:


	Coronation’s current flexible working arrangement is designed to enable in-person connections and collaboration that is core to our culture such that it provides employees the flexibility of working from both the office (on-premises) and remotely.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: careers@coronationinsurance.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

title: Senior HR Business Partner Job at Teal Consulting
content:
Teal Consulting - Our client, a strategic security management firm, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior HR Business Partner

Job Location: Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are seeking an experienced Senior HR Business Partner to drive people strategy, oversee HR operations, and support business alignment through proactive HR interventions.
	This role is instrumental in ensuring compliance, workforce efficiency, and organizational excellence.


Key Responsibilities Includes:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage end-to-end hiring: job ads, interviews, background checks, and onboarding.
	Maintain employee records, draft HR documents, and enforce policies on attendance and conduct.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws (pensions, taxes), and oversee performance reviews, training, and staff engagement.
	Supervise daily admin operations, support staff, and maintain organized records for contracts and licenses.
	Oversee procurement: vendor evaluation, purchase requests, inventory tracking, and co-approval with Finance.
	Prepare monthly reports on HR, administration, and procurement for management.
	Align HR and procurement activities with internal controls and regulatory standards.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor`s Degree
	5+ years of experience in HR, administration, preferably in security, logistics, or service sectors.
	Solid knowledge of Nigerian labor laws, HR compliance, procurement processes, and policy enforcement.
	Skilled in recruitment, vendor evaluation, purchase planning, inventory tracking, and internal controls.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word) and HRIS tools, with strong documentation and reporting abilities.
	Discreet, detail-oriented, and able to multitask effectively in dynamic, fast-paced environments.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: tealconsulting@tealconsulting.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only selected applicants will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Full Stack Developer (Web & AI Workflows) Job at Zocode Limited
content:
Zocode Limited is established as a Business Resources Provider registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission in Nigeria, we provide business solutions to support and help organizations enhance their performance. Our business solution products or services are delivered via channels like software, training, process modeling and optimization. We tell fewer stories and deliver more results. One of our values is “Customer Satisfaction”, to continually deliver solutions that have real impact on our clients by consistently improving the capacity of our personnel, methodologies, and infrastructures.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full Stack Developer (Web & AI Workflows)
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Remote
Employment Type: Contract

Job Description


	We are looking for askilled Full Stack Developer with experience in web application developmentandAI-powered workflows.
	The ideal candidate will have strong expertise inPython, React, Node.js, and integratingAI tools (e.g., OpenAI, LangChain, Hugging Face, etc.)into software solutions.


Responsibilities
You will be responsible for:


	Developing and maintainingscalable web applicationsusingReact (frontend) and Node.js/Python (backend).
	Designing and implementingAI/ML workflowsto enhance application intelligence (e.g., chatbots, automation, data processing).
	Integratingthird-party AI APIs(OpenAI, Gemini, Claude, etc.) and frameworks (LangChain, LlamaIndex) into applications.
	BuildingRESTful APIs and microservicesfor seamless AI model deployment.
	Optimizing applications forperformance, security, and scalability.
	Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
	Staying updated with the latest advancements inAI/ML tools and web technologies.


Requirements
Technical Skills:
Web Development:


	Strong experience inReact.js(with hooks, state management like Redux/Zustand).
	Proficiency inNode.js(Express/Nest.js) andPython(Django/Flask/FastAPI).
	Knowledge ofRESTful APIs, GraphQL, and WebSockets.
	Familiarity with databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Firebase).
	ProficiencyUI/UX Design (Figma).


AI/ML & Workflow Automation:


	Hands-on experience withAI tools (OpenAI API, Gemini, Hugging Face, LangChain, etc.).
	Ability to design and implementAI-powered workflows(e.g., chatbots, document processing, recommendation systems).
	Experience withLLM fine-tuning, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and prompt engineering.
	Basic understanding ofmachine learning models (NLP, computer vision)is a plus.


DevOps & Tools:


	Experience withGit, Docker, CI/CD pipelines.
	Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) for deploying AI models.
	Knowledge ofserverless architectures(AWS Lambda, Firebase Functions).


Soft Skills:


	Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking.
	Ability to work independently and in a team.
	Good communication skills to explain technical concepts.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@zocoderesources.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: This is a 3 months contract with posible extension.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
